definition: This version of the ?? Index Pointing Up emoji has the ?? Medium-light Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Cream White Skin Tone on s http://emojipedia.org/white-up-pointing-index-type-3/
name: index pointing up: medium-light skin tone

bn:00113406a: Being or moving higher in position or greater in some value; being above a former position or level

bn:00092332v: Raise the level or amount of something

bn:00095777v: Be the winner in a contest or competition; be victorious
To get as a price from a lottery or other competition.

bn:00035811n: The finger next to the thumb
The index finger, is the first finger and the second digit of a human hand.
First finger next to the thumb.
The index finger: the first finger next to the thumb.

bn:00034565n: One of the long extremities of the hand, sometimes excluding the thumb.
One of the long extremities of the hand that is used for gripping objects.
Any of the terminal members of the hand (sometimes excepting the thumb)
Organ of manipulation and sensation found in the hands of humans and other primates
A finger is a limb of the human body and a type of digit, an organ of manipulation and sensation found in the hands of humans and other primates.

bn:00042759n: That part of the fore limb below the forearm or wrist in primates (including humans).
The part of the fore limb below the forearm or wrist in a human, and the corresponding part in many other animals.
The zoological term for the distal portion of the forelimb of an animal (including the human hand)
The (prehensile) extremity of the superior limb
The manus is the zoological term for the distal portion of the fore limb of an animal.
A hand, as the part of the fore limb below the forearm in a man, or the corresponding part in other vertebrates.
A hand is a prehensile, multi-fingered extremity located at the end of an arm or forelimb of primates such as humans, chimpanzees, monkeys, and lemurs.

note: This emoji was found in merged_emojis_before_fluentui but not in FluentUI
apple_vendor_description: The index finger pointing up emoji on Apple devices features a medium-light skin tone, rendered with exceptional clarity and a polished 3D effect.  Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and realistic lighting create a sense of tactile presence, with the fingertip distinctly defined and the nail subtly shaded.  This emoji, with its clean lines and upward trajectory, is commonly used to draw attention to something important, indicate a choice, or signal agreement with an idea, all with Apple's signature refined aesthetic.
